Package uk.ac.ncl.manager.department

Class AbstractTaughtStudent

java.lang.Object
uk.ac.ncl.manager.department.AbstractTaughtStudent
All Implemented Interfaces:
Student
Direct Known Subclasses:
PGTStudent, UGStudent
public abstract class AbstractTaughtStudent
extends java.lang.Object
implements Student
Version:
30/10/2020 AbstractTaughtStudent - abstract (partial) implementation for taught students (all but PGR students).
Author:
Joe Sheen
